parameters.jsonBody:
={
  "model": "claude-sonnet-4-20250514",
  "max_tokens": 4000,
  "messages": [{
    "role": "user",
    "content": "Extract ALL events from this Wells Fargo Arena / Iowa Events Center page. Return ONLY a JSON array, no markdown.

For each event include:
- title (string)
- description (string, brief)
- date (ISO 8601 YYYY-MM-DD)
- time (string like '7:30 PM' or null)
- venue_name: 'Wells Fargo Arena'
- address: '730 3rd St, Des Moines, IA 50309'
- city: 'Des Moines'
- state: 'IA'
- category (Sports, Music, Comedy, Family, Other)
- price (string or null)
- image_url (full URL or null)
- ticket_url (full URL or null)
- source_url: 'https://www.iowaeventscenter.com/events'

HTML:
{{ $json.body.substring(0, 25000) }}"
  }]
}
